716623f-a.text:
Beaver Street at the S.e. corner of New Street. The buildings at the right is the Produce Exchange Building. This building was
built in 1884 and will still stand in 1936.
October 12, 1920.
P. L. Sperr.
716623f-a.folder: Beaver Street & New Street, Manhattan, NY

721925f-b.text:
(1)
New Street, south from Beaver, to and including Marketfield Streets.
October 12, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, as seen from No. 50 Broad Street and showing the upper portions. The building with the tower and court effect is the Produce
Exchange which was opened May 6, 1884.
September 16, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
721925f-b.folder: New Street & Beaver Street, Manhattan, NY
